fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Agriculture, Trade, Competition, Business and Industry, Environment, External Relations, Public Health, Food Safety
eu_initiatives: The Lactalis Group engages in many interest areas at the European level. Among others : CAP after 2020, internal market measures, internal market issues, food chain initiatives, food policy and labeling initiatives, school milk scheme, trade policy issues (tariff and non-tariff barriers, trade agreements negotiations, market access).
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership: The company is member of several associations, of which European Dairy Association-EDA is the most important (via membership to the French Dairy Association - ATLA)
position: Communication and External Affaires Director, Lactalis Group
legal_status: Société anonyme à directoire et conseil de surveillance
goals__remit: Created in 1933 by André Besnier in Laval, the Lactalis Group has remained faithful to its original commitment to dairy processing for three generations. Today, Lactalis is a global leader within the dairy industry and is present across all the categories of this market. The Group is the number one cheese manufacturer in the world, and the European leader within the milk consumption, butter and cream markets. It is also a major player in the chilled dairy and dairy ingredients categories, as well as the foodservice industry, and a growing player within clinical and infant nutrition markets.
